trans-unit.source: Contains border styles for the cells in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control allows you to fully customize its appearance, including the borders of the cells and headers.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> has <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties that allow you to set the appearance of the cell border.

However, if you need to further customize the borders, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> class allows you to set the style of the border on the individual sides of the cells.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> properties of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> represent the left, right, top, and bottom border of a cell, respectively.

You can set these properties on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> to produce various appearances for the borders between the cells.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the border style for all of the borders of a cell.

If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> properties are not set to the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> value, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.All%2A> property value is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet>.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> values.
The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> values.
The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet"></xref>.
-or-

The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetDouble"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetPartial"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.InsetDouble"></xref> and this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> instance was retrieved through the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> property.
Gets or sets the style for the bottom border of a cell.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> values.
The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> values.
The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet"></xref>.
Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to be compared.
`true` if other is a and the values for the , , , and properties are equal to their counterpart in the current ; otherwise, `false`.
Serves as a hash function for a particular type.
A hash code for the current <xref href="System.Object"></xref>.
Gets the style for the left border of a cell.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> values.
The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref>.
The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet"></xref>.
-or-

The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.InsetDouble"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetDouble"></xref> and this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> instance has an associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control with a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft"></xref> property value of `true`.
Gets the style for the right border of a cell.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> values.
The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref>.
The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet"></xref>.
-or-

The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.InsetDouble"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetDouble"></xref> and this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> instance has an associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control with a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft"></xref> property value of `false`.
Gets the style for the top border of a cell.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> values.
The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref>.
The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet"></xref>.
Returns a string that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.ToString%2A> method returns a string that includes the values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.All%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A> properties.
A string that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref>.
Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ICloneable> interface.
A copy of the current instance.
